en.camera.title: Step 1: Upload Photo
en.camera.subtitle: Take or upload a clear front-facing photo for AI face analysis
en.camera.tip2: Face the camera directly, keep face clear
en.recommender.title: AI Hairstyle Recommendation
en.recommender.basedOn: Based on your {faceShape} face shape and selected {hairstyle}
en.recommender.feature1: Personalized advice based on face shape and hairstyle features
en.recommender.feature2: Includes daily care, styling, and precautions
en.recommender.feature3: Consult a professional stylist for final decisions
en.gallery.title: Step 3: Choose Your Favorite Hairstyle
en.gallery.subtitle: Based on your {faceShape} face shape, these hairstyles are recommended for you
en.gallery.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting search or filter conditions
en.faceShape.Oval: Standard face shape, suitable for almost all hairstyles
en.faceShape.Round: Face length and width are similar, need to elongate face shape through hairstyle
en.faceShape.Square: Obvious jaw angle, need to soften contours through hairstyle
en.faceShape.Heart: Wider forehead, sharper chin, need to balance upper and lower proportions
en.faceShape.Long: Face length is significantly greater than face width, need to increase width through hairstyle
en.results.title: Step 4: Your Personalized Hairstyle Recommendation
en.results.subtitle: Personalized hairstyle plan generated based on AI analysis
